a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Included are deaths of combatants and civilians due to fighting in interstate, intrastate, and extrasystemic conflicts
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program (2023); Peace Research Institute Oslo (2017)
Note: 'Best' estimates as identified by UCDP.
